name: PAT_REL_INFO_EPSD
description: This table contains episode-level relationship information about patient relationships. These relationship items are specific to certain episodes. The records included in this table are Patient Relationships (RLA) records.

columns.name: PAT_RELATIONSHIP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient contact.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the episode this patient contact is linked to.

columns.name: EPSD_INVOLVEMENT_START_DATE
columns.description: The date when the patient contact's involvement in the episode starts.

columns.name: EPSD_INVOLVEMENT_END_DATE
columns.description: The date when the patient contact's involvement in the episode ends.

columns.name: EPSD_LAST_REV_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that this patient contact's general or episode-specific information was last reviewed or updated.

columns.name: EPSD_REV_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the last user who reviewed or updated this patient contact's information for the specific episode.

columns.name: EPSD_REV_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EPSD_DISPLAY_SEQ
columns.description: Used to save the order in which episode-level contacts for a given patient should display within a specific episode.
